[Page Title: Whiskey Run Sports Bar & Grill - North Charleston, SC]

×

Call to Inquire × 
Did you know we do catering?

Whatever your occasion, however big or small, we have the perfect options to choose from.

Cater your birthday party, holiday party, corporate events, wedding festivities and more!
Catering Packages × 
We're hiring! Call, email or submit an inquiry today to learn more!
Job Listings × 
Let us host your special event!

Whether a birthday party, office function or any other special occasion - we take care of all the fine details, bringing your event to life, just as you imagined.

Host your next party or get together
Book your party 
5060 Dorchester Road, North Charleston, SC 29418
map marker pin PARTIES 
We host. You party!

Need the perfect space for your special event? Your search is over.
Parties book now CATERING 
Defining delicious

Give your special event a feast to remember!
Catering OUR STORY 
Welcome to WHISKEY RUN

Established in 2021, Whiskey Run is a cozy take on a traditional Bar. Located in the heart of North Charleston, we make sure that if you’re looking for a night of fun and entertainment, we’re the only place you’re going to want to be!
Read More about us WHISKEY BAR 
Let us pour you a drink

The perfect place to kick back, relax and enjoy the finest whiskies available!
Drinks 
Order online

Pick Up Your Favorite Food

Don't feel like cooking today? We got you covered - order now!
Order 
Reviews

Review by - Google

Isaac W:

One of the best bars in the market. If you're looking for a relaxing area and staff that don't over ask to serve and exactly what you need this is your home...

Review by - Google

Johnna M:

I cannot believe it's taken me this long to post a review! I love this place. Food is great. The new game room is amazing. Indoor bar that extends outside for smokers...

Review by - Google

Humberto G:

Great spot. Staff was awesome. Food was on point. Can't go wrong with breakfast burger. Sampler was good. Strong drinks.

Review by - Google

Doug D:

The Bartenders are awesome and the food is great! Also has the longest bar counter that I've ever seen! Finally a great bar close to my house

Review by - Google

mac G:

Great drink selection, excellent service. Absolutely amazing prices. Would highly recommend for anyone looking for a laid-back relax bar style around Charleston.
Stop reviews carousel Play reviews carousel
